name: Adrift (Jennifer Ann's Group)
description:
"Adrift" is an award winning serious game about consent.

This clever game explores the concept and meaning of consent through a series of interactions between a member of an interstellar salvage crew and the AI found on an abandoned spaceship. You have received a distress signal and your job is to board the distressed ship and try to help.

Adrift was designed and developed by Carrie Crossley and Andrew Connell of the U.S. and was produced by Jennifer Ann's Group, a nonprofit charity.
